title: About
text:
Pedro César  Del Campo Neira



  



Statistician and Data Scientist who transforms complex data into clear, actionable insights through visualization, modeling, and evidence-based storytelling.
I am passionate about using data to understand people, systems, and real-world challenges. My goal is to make insights accessible, meaningful, and useful for better decision-making.
